attributes.action: Have a referendum on the referendum to overturn the original referendum.
attributes.background: There has been a petition created to argue for another referendum on British EU membership and I believe this to be a mechanism to create further divisions and panic throughout our economy, government and society.

rejection.details:
If you are opposed to the idea of having a second referendum, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345
